text.automated_crafting.name: Automated Crafting
text.autoconfig.automated_crafting.title: Configurazione fabbricazione automatica
text.autoconfig.automated_crafting.optio: In simple mode you can set a recipe template
If the block above an auto crafter would be powered, the auto crafter is powered (but not updated)
Attiva il reindirizzamento della polvere di pietrarossa
Redstone dust next to auto an crafter will point into the auto crafter
When an auto crafter is powered and contains a valid recipe, that recipe will be crafted immediately
Il comparatore legge 15 se l'output non è vuoto
A comparator reading an auto crafter with anything in its output slot will read 15
Download translations from Crowdin when the game launches
